title: microsoft visual c ++ error
body: Hi, i just got new computer, and i tried to install league of legeds, so i downloaded client but when i start instalation, it says that i need to install microsoft visual c++, but when i do that i get error..  And even if i download microsoft visual c++ 2005 sp1 on it own from microsoft.com i get this error can anyone please help me with this ? :)

replies.body:
This error will typically pop up on new computers if there are many missing packages missing that League relies on. The first thing you'll want to do is run all available windows updates before installing [**this standalone package**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) from Microsoft.

Let me know if this fixed it for you!
